p: Magnetic measurements performed by SQUID in the thin film samples are not accurate enough to conclude about the magnetic properties of the tetragonal GMO film (for details, see Supplemental Material). The magnetic contribution of the GMO phase, subtracted from the diamagnetic signal of the substrate, shows no hysteresis and a small paramagnetic signal (χ ~3.10 −3 at 5 K). Besides, no relevant anomalies are observable near 32 K.
